summary: An entomologist and painter who moves into an old house with his family discovers the work of a mysterious scientist. He finds a cinematography archive with a completely new theory on the reasons why humans became bipedal.
cast: Aleksandr Anikeyenko|Sergey Chernov|Stanislav Ilyukhin|Valeri Krishtapenko|Nikolay Marton|Viktor Mikhaylov|Yelena Sapozhinskaya|Aleksey Tarasov|Yury Zverlin
title: Pryamokhozhdenie
